message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique and high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand that $200 might be a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $175. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate the compromise, but $175 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $150, but that's my maximum

I understand that $150 is your maximum, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $165. It's a small increase from your maximum, but I think it's a fair price for the product's quality and value.
